properties.areaDesc: Randall; Hartley; Texas; Hutchinson; Potter; Deaf Smith; Hansford; Sherman; Cimarron; Oldham; Moore; Palo Duro Canyon; Dallam; Armstrong; Carson
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued January 13 at 3:53AM CST until January 13 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a Red Flag
Warning for strong winds and low relative humidity values, which
is in effect from noon today to 7 PM CST this evening. The Fire
Weather Watch is no longer in effect.

* Affected Area...In Oklahoma...Cimarron and Texas. In Texas...
Dallam...Sherman...Hansford...Hartley...Moore...Hutchinson...
Oldham...Potter...Carson...Deaf Smith...Randall...Armstrong
and Palo Duro Canyon.

* 20 Foot Winds...Southwest winds 20 to 25 mph with higher gusts.

* Relative Humidity...Minimum relative humidity values of 13 to 17
percent are expected.

* Red Flag Threat Index...2 to 4.

* Timing...Critical fire weather conditions are forecast to begin
around noon today and end by 7 PM CST this evening.
properties.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions
are either occurring now...or will shortly. A combination of
strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures will
create favorable weather for rapid fire growth and spread. Avoid
activities that promote open flames and sparks.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 7 PM CST THIS EVENING FOR STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES FOR WESTERN AND CENTRAL SECTIONS OF THE OKLAHOMA AND TEXAS PANHANDLES
